name: Pearson plc
description: Pearson plc is a British multinational publishing and education company, renowned for its commitment to providing high-quality educational resources and services. Founded in 1844, Pearson has evolved from its origins in publishing to become a global leader in digital education. The company focuses on creating innovative and engaging learning experiences, offering a wide range of products and services that cater to learners of all ages. Pearson’s portfolio includes textbooks, digital learning platforms, assessment tools, and professional development resources. The company operates through various segments, including Higher Education, K-12 Education, Professional & Career Development, and English Language Learning. Pearson is dedicated to improving education outcomes by leveraging technology and data analytics to personalize learning and enhance engagement. The company’s mission is to help people make progress in their lives through learning, and it strives to empower educators and learners globally. With a strong presence in North America, Europe, and Asia, Pearson continues to adapt to the changing educational landscape by investing in digital transformation and innovative solutions that meet the needs of modern learners.
